sentences.translation: 我强烈建议进行预注册。

sentences.sentence: As we have to bear this responsibility you will understand that we only allow companies who cooperate with us in a proper contractual way to use our preregistration Numbers.
sentences.translation: 鉴于我们承担着责任，你们可以理解我们只能允许跟我们存在契约方式合作的公司去使用我们的预注册号码。

sentences.sentence: Considering that the Australian dollar exchanges favorably with many currencies, those who were unable to take advantage of preregistration discounts can still afford to travel to Brisbane.
sentences.translation: 因为目前澳币对其他货币的汇率多数偏低，错过机会未能享有以先注册优惠者，现在决定前往布理斯班仍不至于荷包大失血。
